trans-unit.source: An abstract class that describes a gradient, composed of gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: 抽象类，用于描述渐变的渐变停止点组成。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from GradientBrush describe different ways of interpreting gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: 从 GradientBrush 继承的类描述了解释渐变停止点的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: A GradientBrush is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: GradientBrush 是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref> used to specify the location and color of the transition points in a gradient.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>用于渐变中指定的位置和转换点的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how the gradient's colors are interpolated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref>枚举，它指定如何内插的渐变颜色。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the colors in a gradient are interpolated.
trans-unit.target: 指定内插渐变的颜色的方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush's gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置画笔的渐变停止点。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> objects associated with the brush, each of which specifies a color and an offset along the brush's gradient axis.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref>画笔，其中每个指定一种颜色和一个沿画笔渐变轴偏移量与关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the gradient brush's positioning coordinates are absolute or relative to the output area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>枚举指定渐变画笔定位坐标是绝对的还是相对于输出区。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> indicates the gradient brush's coordinates are expressed using device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>指示渐变画笔的坐标来表示使用设备无关的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref> value that specifies how the gradient brush's positioning coordinates are interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref>解释值，该值指定如何渐变画笔定位坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of spread method that specifies how to draw a gradient that starts or ends inside the bounds of the object to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定如何绘制的渐变的开始或结束要绘制的对象的边界内的扩展方法的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the available spread methods and their effect on <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示可用的传播方法以及它们对<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush></xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>影响

trans-unit.source: The red line indicates the gradient space.
trans-unit.target: 红线指示的渐变的空间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>定义自己的渐变空间与其<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>定义自己的渐变空间与其<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![Different GradientSpread settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "Different GradientSpread settings") Gradient spread methods ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![不同的 GradientSpread 设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "不同的 GradientSpread 设置")渐变扩展方法 # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The type of spread method used to paint the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制渐变的扩展方法的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
